study_title: Shotgun Sequencing of Tara Oceans DNA samples from size fractions containing mainly DNA viruses
description: Seawater from different depths was precipitaded then filtered to retain small particle sizes (Virus particles). The DNA was extracted and submitted to high throughput sequencing.
project_name: Shotgun Sequencing of Tara Oceans DNA samples from size fractions containing mainly DNA viruses
